title: Drew Pearson interview, Matthew Stafford apology, Danielle Hunter contract (Football 06/28)
description:
Will Brinson is joined on the program by Cowboys legend and recent "The Young and the Restless" star Drew Pearson. Pearson explains what it was like to work on a soap opera, how he got into soaps in the first place, his grade for David Akers announcing the Eagles pick at May's draft, what he thinks about the Cowboys wide receivers this year and more. Will also apologizes for missing out on Matthew Stafford during the QB draft on Wednesday and debates (with himself) whether he would rather have the Vikings or Jaguars defense for the next three years.
